thread.title: A 3rd F1 world title would secure legacy for Lewis Hamilton
thread.title_full: A 3rd F1 world title would secure legacy for Lewis Hamilton

title: A 3rd F1 world title would secure legacy for Lewis Hamilton
text:
> Sports A 3rd F1 world title would secure legacy for Lewis Hamilton Mercedes driver Lewis Hamilton, of Britain, left, and Red Bull driver Daniel Ricciardo, of Australia, depart a news conference at the Formula One U.S. Grand Prix auto race at the Circuit of the Americas, Thursday, Oct. 22, 2015, in Austin, Texas. (AP Photo/Eric Gay) The most compelling, sharable stories from across the web.
